faqs.question: What makes Vegas Christian Gifts unique?
faqs.answer: We specialize in creating personalized Christian gifts with a unique blend of faith and craftsmanship. Each item is carefully selected and can be customized to create meaningful, lasting memories for your loved ones.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number on our website or the carrier's website to monitor your package's journey. We provide real-time updates to ensure you're always informed about your order's status.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee on all non-personalized items. Items must be returned in their original condition and packaging. For personalized items, we handle returns on a case-by-case basis if there are any production errors.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by location. During checkout, you'll see available shipping options and estimated delivery dates for your specific location.

faqs.question: How do I care for my engraved items?
faqs.answer: To maintain the quality of engraved items, we recommend gentle cleaning with a soft, dry cloth. Avoid harsh chemicals and excessive moisture. For specific materials, detailed care instructions are included with your purchase.

faqs.question: Can I customize my gift?
faqs.answer: Yes! Most of our products can be personalized with names, dates, or special messages. Look for the customization options on each product page. We also offer custom design consultations for special requests.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, and various digital payment methods. All transactions are secured with industry-standard encryption.

faqs.question: How long does customization take?
faqs.answer: Customization typically adds 2-3 business days to the processing time. During peak seasons (holidays), this might extend to 3-5 business days. Rush options are available for urgent orders.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer premium gift wrapping services. You can select this option during checkout. Each wrapped gift includes a personalized message card and is packaged with care to ensure a beautiful presentation.

faqs.question: What if my item arrives damaged?
faqs.answer: If your item arrives damaged, please contact us within 48 hours with photos of the damage. We'll promptly send a replacement or issue a refund. We take extra care in packaging, but if any issues occur, we'll make it right.

faqs.question: Do you offer bulk or wholesale orders?
faqs.answer: Yes, we welcome bulk and wholesale orders. Special pricing is available for orders of 10 or more items. Contact our wholesale department for pricing and details about our wholesale program.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer service?
faqs.answer: Our customer service team is available Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm PST. You can reach us through our contact form, email, or phone. We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 business hours.
